blocks.name: eqsnd
blocks.content: Deduce that a set is a singleton. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 10-May-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqsnd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, csn(c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqrdv(s0, c0, csn(c1), w0)
  syl6bbr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  impbida(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  eqeltrd(cv(s0), c0, c1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c1, c0))
  elsn(cv(s0), c1)
  vex(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqsnd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = { c1 })
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ s0 = c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqrdv(s0, c0, { c1 }, w0)
  syl6bbr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ { c1 }, s0 = c1)
  impbida(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s0 = c1)
  eqeltrd(s0, c0, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 = c1))
  simpr(w0, s0 = c1)
  adantr(w0, s0 = c1, c1 ∈ c0)
  elsn(s0, c1)
  vex(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}

blocks.name: elpreq
blocks.content: Equality wihin a pair. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Aug-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpreq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpr(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cpr(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2)))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2))
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c2)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(c0, c2))
  biimpa(w0, wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2))
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, c3, wa(w0, wn(wceq(c0, c2))))
  orcanai(w0, wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c0, c3))
  syl(w0, wo(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c0, c3)), wcel(c0, cpr(c2, c3)))
  elpri(c0, c2, c3)
  sylc(wa(w0, wn(wceq(c0, c2))), wceq(c1, c3), w0, wn(wceq(c1, c2)))
  simpl(w0, wn(wceq(c0, c2)))
  biimpa(w0, wn(wceq(c0, c2)), wn(wceq(c1, c2)))
  notbid(w0, wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2))
  3syl(w0, wi(wn(wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, c3)), wcel(c1, cpr(c2, c3)), wo(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c1, c3)))
  elpri(c1, c2, c3)
  pm2.53(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c1, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elpreq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ { c2, c3 })
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ { c2, c3 })
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 = c2 ↔ c1 = c2))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, c0 = c1, c0 = c2)
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, c2, (w0 ∧ c0 = c2))
  simpr(w0, c0 = c2)
  biimpa(w0, c0 = c2, c1 = c2)
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, c3, (w0 ∧ ¬ c0 = c2))
  orcanai(w0, c0 = c2, c0 = c3)
  syl(w0, (c0 = c2 ∨ c0 = c3), c0 ∈ { c2, c3 })
  elpri(c0, c2, c3)
  sylc((w0 ∧ ¬ c0 = c2), c1 = c3, w0, ¬ c1 = c2)
  simpl(w0, ¬ c0 = c2)
  biimpa(w0, ¬ c0 = c2, ¬ c1 = c2)
  notbid(w0, c0 = c2, c1 = c2)
  3syl(w0, (¬ c1 = c2 → c1 = c3), c1 ∈ { c2, c3 }, (c1 = c2 ∨ c1 = c3))
  elpri(c1, c2, c3)
  pm2.53(c1 = c2, c1 = c3)
}
